name: Amnizu
resistance: cold; bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

traits.name: Devil's Sight
traits.desc: Magical darkness doesn't impede the amnizu's darkvision.

traits.name: Innate Spellcasting
traits.desc: The amnizu's innate spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save DC 19, +11 to hit with spell attacks). The amnizu can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components: * At will: charm person, command * 3/day each: dominate person, fireball * 1/day each: dominate monster, feeblemind

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The amnizu has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.
